thread.title: 'Real Housewives of New Jersey' Star Kim DePaola's Car Involved in a Double Murder Investigation
thread.title_full: 'Real Housewives of New Jersey' Star Kim DePaola's Car Involved in a Double Murder Investigation

author: Rachel McRady
title: 'Real Housewives of New Jersey' Star Kim DePaola's Car Involved in a Double Murder Investigation
text: ‘Real Housewives of New Jersey’ Star Kim DePaola’s Car Involved in a Double Murder Investigation by Rachel McRady 1:23 AM PDT, March 20, 2017 Photo: Getty Images Longtime Real Housewives of New Jersey guest star and frenemy Kim DePaola is reportedly at the center of a double murder investigation – or at least her car is. WATCH: 'RHONJ' Star Teresa Giudice Thanks Fans For Support After Mother's Death: 'She'll Be Deeply Missed' According to multiple reports, police are investigating the New Jersey crime, which took the lives of two male victims, who were allegedly shot and set on fire while inside of DePaola’s Audi. One law enforcement source told NBC News that the victims’ bodies were so charred that police had to use dental records to identify the men. According to TMZ , DePaola’s son Chris regularly drives the car, but was taken to the airport by a friend last week. Though he was supposedly told not to drive the car, it appears that Chris’ friend did and has not been reached since the incident occurred. A post shared by Kim DePaola (@kimdposche) on Mar 19, 2017 at 12:18pm PDT DePaola herself seeming confirmed the reports on Sunday, posting a message to Instagram. “I am humbled by the outpour of love and support during this very difficult time. My son and I are both safe. Our deepest condolences go out to the victims’ families of this truly horrific tragedy,” she wrote. For more from the RHONJ cast, watch the clip below.
